H0.text: Endocrine is the body system that functions by bringing in oxygen and removing carbon dioxide.

H1.text: The respiratory system functions by bringing in oxygen and removing carbon dioxide.

H2.text: Digestive is the body system that functions by bringing in oxygen and removing carbon dioxide.

H3.text: The urinary system functions by bringing in oxygen and removing carbon dioxide.

A4.text: Some oxygen is taken up from the outside air and some carbon dioxide is discharged into the atmosphere.

A5.text: The respiratory system (also respiratory apparatus, ventilatory system) is a biological system consisting of specific organs and structures used for gas exchange in animals and plants.
